title: Milestone Memories
description: Test your knowledge about company history and milestones!

questions.text: What's traditionally the gift for a 5-year work anniversary?
questions.hint: It's something natural that symbolizes strength and growth.

questions.text: Which milestone is typically considered a 'major' work anniversary?
questions.hint: It's usually celebrated with a special recognition or gift.

questions.text: What's a thoughtful way to recognize a colleague's work anniversary?

options.text: Ignore it to avoid making them feel old
Send a company-wide email listing all their mistakes
Share specific contributions they've made to the team
Give them more work as a 'reward'

questions.hint: Think about what would make someone feel valued.
